content: a blend of playful style and function add a relaxed vibe to your space with this crochet basket stitched using the scrappy multi-colored effect of bernat blanket patchwork each basket is a one-of-a-kind project crocheted in rounds with 2 strands held together it offers a sturdy rigid structure measuring 17 in diameter by 19 high this attractive accent is the perfect size to keep any room clutter-free materials bernat® blanket patchwork™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a pastry cream 47002 3 balls or 534 yds/485 m contrast b ocean waves 47015 4 balls or 693 yds/630 m measurements approx 17 43 cm diameter x 19 48 cm high unfolded and excluding fringe
